title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Jan 20 MO [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Monday, 20 January 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Monday, January 20 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex unravels the latest in government lies and misinformation. 

The State Dept. ordered the TSA to spare members of the Muslim Brotherhood from the invasive screening process that millions of Americans endure at airports everyday, according to an official document. These members were given preferential treatment despite their organization's ties to al-Qaeda. 

Former New Mexico governor and presidential candidate Gary Johnson is in studio to talk about the latest in government abuses and hypocrisy.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
